description: Customs declaration document analyzer for extracting trade compliance fields

shipper.description: Name and address of the shipper, sender, exporter, or consignor

receiver.description: Name and address of the receiver, consignee, importer, or buyer

goodsDescription.description: Description of the goods, merchandise, or commodity being shipped

value.description: Declared value or total amount with currency (e.g., 1500.00 USD)

countryOfOrigin.description: Country of origin, manufacture, or production of the goods

hsCode.description: Harmonized System (HS) code, tariff code, or commodity classification

weight.description: Gross or net weight of the shipment with unit (e.g., 25 KG)
